verses.verse: וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar saw הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, And when the people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for בֹשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH954> vo-Shesh delayed מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh that Moses לָרֶ֣דֶת <WH3381> la-Re-det to come down מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> ha-Har; out of the mount וַיִּקָּהֵ֨ל <WH6950> vai-yik-ka-Hel gathered themselves together הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> ha-'Am the people עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- about אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru and said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> 'e-Lav to him ק֣וּם׀ <WH6965> kum unto him Up עֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> 'a-seh- make לָ֣נוּ La-nu אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, us gods אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יֵֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> ye-le-Chu will go לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-nu, before כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for זֶ֣ה׀ <WH2088> zeh this מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh us for [as for] this Moses הָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish, the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הֶֽעֱלָ֙נוּ֙ <WH5927> he-'e-La-nu that brought מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz us up out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not יָדַ֖עְנוּ <WH3045> ya-Da'-nu we wot מֶה־ <WH4100> meh- what הָ֥יָה <WH1961> Ha-yah has become לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-le-Hem about אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, And Aaron פָּֽרְקוּ֙ <WH6561> pa-re-Ku unto them Break off נִזְמֵ֣י <WH5141> niz-Mei earrings הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> haz-za-Hav, the golden אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> be-'a-ze-Nei which [are] in the ears נְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם <WH802> ne-shei-Chem, of your wives בְּנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1121> be-nei-Chem of your sons וּבְנֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1323> u-ve-no-tei-Chem; and of your daughters וְהָבִ֖יאוּ <WH935> ve-ha-Vi-'u and bring אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> 'e-Lai. about

וַיִּתְפָּֽרְקוּ֙ <WH6561> vai-yit-pa-re-Ku brake off כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, And all the people אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נִזְמֵ֥י <WH5141> niz-Mei earrings הַזָּהָ֖ב <WH2091> haz-za-Hav the golden אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּאָזְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH241> be-'a-ze-nei-Hem; which [were] in their ears וַיָּבִ֖יאוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vi-'u and brought אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron. [them] unto Aaron

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach And he received מִיָּדָ֗ם <WH3027> mi-ya-Dam, [them] at their hand וַיָּ֤צַר <WH3335> vai-Ya-tzar earthen אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To בַּחֶ֔רֶט <WH2747> ba-Che-ret, it with a graving tool וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֖הוּ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Se-hu after he had made עֵ֣גֶל <WH5695> 'E-gel calf מַסֵּכָ֑ה <WH4541> mas-se-Chah; it a molten וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and they said אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh This אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha These [be] thy gods יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, O Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הֶעֱל֖וּךָ <WH5927> he-'e-Lu-cha which brought מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz thee up out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar saw אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, And when Aaron וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven [it] he built מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> miz-Be-ach an altar לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav; before וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra made proclamation אַֽהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron it and Aaron וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar, and said חַ֥ג <WH2282> chag [is] a feast לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh to the LORD מָחָֽר׃ <WH4279> ma-Char. To morrow

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֙ימוּ֙ <WH7925> vai-yash-Ki-mu And they rose up early מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> mi-mo-cho-Rat, on the morrow וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu and offered עֹלֹ֔ת <WH5930> 'o-Lot, burnt offerings וַיַּגִּ֖שׁוּ <WH5066> vai-yag-Gi-shu and brought שְׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> she-la-Mim; peace offerings וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> vai-Ye-shev sat הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am and the people לֶֽאֱכֹ֣ל <WH398> le-'e-Chol down to eat וְשָׁת֔וֹ <WH8354> ve-sha-To, and to drink וַיָּקֻ֖מוּ <WH6965> vai-ya-Ku-mu and rose up לְצַחֵֽק׃ <WH6711> le-tza-Chek. to play פ Peh

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh; unto Moses לֶךְ־ <WH1980> lech- Go רֵ֕ד <WH3381> red get thee down כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for שִׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> shi-Chet have corrupted עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha, for thy people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הֶעֱלֵ֖יתָ <WH5927> he-'e-Lei-ta which thou broughtest מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

סָ֣רוּ <WH5493> Sa-ru They have turned מַהֵ֗ר <WH4118> ma-Her, aside quickly מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> had-De-rech out of the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוִּיתִ֔ם <WH6680> tziv-vi-Tim, which I commanded עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su them they have made לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, עֵ֖גֶל <WH5695> 'E-gel calf מַסֵּכָ֑ה <WH4541> mas-se-Chah; them a molten וַיִּשְׁתַּֽחֲווּ־ <WH7812> vai-yish-ta-cha-vu- and have worshipped לוֹ֙ lo וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <WH2076> vai-yiz-be-chu- it and have sacrificed ל֔וֹ lo, וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, thereunto and said אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh This אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha These [be] thy gods יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, O Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הֶֽעֱל֖וּךָ <WH5927> he-'e-Lu-cha which have brought thee up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh; unto Moses רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> ra-'I-ti I have seen אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> ha-'Am this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold עַם־ <WH5971> 'am- people קְשֵׁה־ <WH7186> ke-sheh- churlish עֹ֖רֶף <WH6203> 'O-ref stiff-necked הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah Now הַנִּ֣יחָה <WH3240> han-Ni-chah Now therefore let me alone לִּ֔י Li, וְיִֽחַר־ <WH2734> ve-yi-char- may wax hot אַפִּ֥י <WH639> 'ap-Pi that my wrath בָהֶ֖ם va-Hem וַאֲכַלֵּ֑ם <WH3615> va-'a-chal-Lem; against them and that I may consume וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> ve-'e-'e-Seh them and I will make אוֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> 'ot-Cha לְג֥וֹי <WH1471> le-Goy nation גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> ga-Dol. of thee a great

לָמָּה֩ <WH4100> lam-Mah Why יֹאמְר֨וּ <WH559> yo-me-Ru speak מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4713> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, and say בְּרָעָ֤ה <WH7451> be-ra-'Ah For mischief הֽוֹצִיאָם֙ <WH3318> ho-tzi-'Am did he bring לַהֲרֹ֤ג <WH2026> la-ha-Rog them out to slay אֹתָם֙ <WH853> 'o-Tam בֶּֽהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> be-ha-Rim, them in the mountains וּ֨לְכַלֹּתָ֔ם <WH3615> u-le-chal-lo-Tam, and to consume מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> me-'Al about פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei them from the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah; land שׁ֚וּב <WH7725> uv break מֵחֲר֣וֹן <WH2740> me-cha-Ron from thy fierce אַפֶּ֔ךָ <WH639> 'ap-Pe-cha, wrath וְהִנָּחֵ֥ם <WH5162> ve-hin-na-Chem and repent עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- about הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah of this evil לְעַמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5971> le-'am-Me-cha. against thy people

זְכֹ֡ר <WH2142> ze-Chor Remember לְאַבְרָהָם֩ <WH85> le-'av-ra-Ham Abraham לְיִצְחָ֨ק <WH3327> le-yitz-Chak Isaac וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> u-le-Yis-ra-'El and Israel עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dei-cha, thy servants אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher to whom נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתָּ <WH7650> nish-Ba'-ta to whom thou swarest לָהֶם֮ la-Hem בָּךְ֒ boCh וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> vat-te-dab-Ber by thine own self and saidst אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem, to אַרְבֶּה֙ <WH7235> 'ar-Beh unto them I will multiply אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- זַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <WH2233> zar-'a-Chem, your seed כְּכוֹכְבֵ֖י <WH3556> ke-choch-Vei as the stars הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הָאָ֨רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz and all this land הַזֹּ֜את <WH2063> haz-Zot likewise אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher of which אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti, that I have spoken אֶתֵּן֙ <WH5414> 'et-Ten of will I give לְזַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <WH2233> le-zar-'a-Chem, unto your seed וְנָחֲל֖וּ <WH5157> ve-na-cha-Lu and they shall inherit לְעֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> le-'o-Lam. [it] for ever

וַיִּנָּ֖חֶם <WH5162> vai-yin-Na-chem repented יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; And the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- about הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah, of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> dib-Ber which he thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to do לְעַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> le-'am-Mo. unto his people פ Peh

וַיִּ֜פֶן <WH6437> vai-Yi-fen turned וַיֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> vai-Ye-red and went down מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> ha-Har, from the mount וּשְׁנֵ֛י <WH8147> u-she-Nei and the two לֻחֹ֥ת <WH3871> lu-Chot tables הָעֵדֻ֖ת <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut of the testimony בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> be-ya-Do; [were] in his hand לֻחֹ֗ת <WH3871> lu-Chot, the tables כְּתֻבִים֙ <WH3789> ke-tu-Vim [were] written מִשְּׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> mish-she-Nei on both עֶבְרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5676> 'ev-rei-Hem, their sides מִזֶּ֥ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh one וּמִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> u-miz-Zeh and the other הֵ֥ם <WH1992> hem they כְּתֻבִֽים׃ <WH3789> ke-tu-Vim. on the one side and on the other [were] they written

וְהַ֨לֻּחֹ֔ת <WH3871> ve-Hal-lu-Chot, And the tables מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh [were] the work אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him of God הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah; like וְהַמִּכְתָּ֗ב <WH4385> ve-ham-mich-Tav, and the writing מִכְתַּ֤ב <WH4385> mich-Tav [was] the writing אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him of God ה֔וּא <WH1931> Hu, he חָר֖וּת <WH2801> cha-Rut graven עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַלֻּחֹֽת׃ <WH3871> hal-lu-Chot. upon the tables

וַיִּשְׁמַ֧ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' heard יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And when Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol the noise הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am of the people בְּרֵעֹ֑ה <WH7452> be-re-'Oh; as they shouted וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer he said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, unto Moses ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol [There is] a noise מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> mil-cha-Mah of war בַּֽמַּחֲנֶה׃ <WH4264> Bam-ma-cha-neh in the camp
